backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining user profiles, surgery case types, access control, and CRUD operations with per-user case storage and sync timestamps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend file paths with human-written summaries describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_NOTES.md: Markdown instructions for when and how to redeploy the frontend with fresh backend bindings.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with light/dark theme CSS variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading the React app and its main TypeScript module.
frontend/redeploy.sh: Shell script performing deterministic clean rebuild plus frontend deployment with network detection and verification steps.
Script that performs deterministic frontend rebuild, regenerates backend TypeScript bindings, checks for legacy methods, and builds the app.
frontend/scripts/verify-live-backend-bin: Guide for verifying that the deployed frontend uses up‑to‑date backend bindings and correct canister IDs.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, backend connection, profile setup, case creation/editing, and global layout. Manages modals, sorting, search, and conditional UI states.
frontend/src/components/cases/CameraCapt: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseCard.t: Displays a surgery case summary with edit, task toggling, and delete actions. Handles task updates and deletion via mutations and shows confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Form for creating or editing a surgery case with prefilling, validation, demographics parsing, and task checklist setup. Manages form state, initialization, and save/update logic.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseList.t: Fetches and displays a sortable, searchable list of cases with loading and error states. Filters, sorts, and renders CaseCards or empty-state guidance.
Date input component combining a native date field with a popover calendar. Validates, parses, and syncs date-only string values.
frontend/src/components/cases/Demographi: Textarea that extracts demographics from pasted text and passes parsed data to a callback. Clears itself after processing input.
frontend/src/components/cases/EmptyCases: Renders guidance when no cases exist, including migration instructions based on environment and connection status. Shows different messages depending on authentication and connectivity.
frontend/src/components/cases/ServerCase: Displays a destructive alert when server case loading fails and provides a retry button.
frontend/src/components/cases/SortContro: Provides UI controls to select sort field and toggle sort direction for cases.
frontend/src/components/cases/TasksCheck: Shows required, incomplete tasks for a case with checkboxes and optional task highlighting.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvExportBut: Exports all cases to a CSV file and shows success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvImportDia: Handles CSV file upload, parsing, validation, and importing cases into the store.
frontend/src/components/errors/BackendCo: Displays a troubleshooting banner for backend connection failures with retry and documentation links.
frontend/src/components/errors/ModalErro: Error boundary for modals that logs errors and shows a fallback alert with a close button.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the app footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Shows app header with login/logout handling, environment label, and clearing of local data on logout.
frontend/src/components/startup/StartupR: Displays a recovery screen for startup connection errors with guidance and retry/reload actions.
frontend/src/components/sync/SyncStatusB: UI bar showing online status, backend connection state, and a sync button with error handling and toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wraps useActor with error tracking and retry logic, surfacing initialization failures to the UI.
Combines identity and actor state to determine backend connectivity via ping probes and exposes retry functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useCasesStore.ts: Manages local and server surgery cases, merging them and supporting add/update operations with local persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnvironmentLabel.t: Derives an environment label (Draft or Live) from the current hostname.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status via navigator and window events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and surgery cases, including paginated case retrieval and case creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSync.ts: Implements local-to-server case synchronization with normalization, pagination-based fetching, merging, and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light and dark modes with global base styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity, global styles, and renders the App component.
frontend/src/types/cases.ts: Declares local surgery case types and form data structures extending backend models.
Classifies backend errors into categories and generates user-friendly error messages.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Handles CSV export and import for surgery cases, including parsing, validation, and task column processing.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Provides timezone-safe utilities for validating, converting, and formatting date-only strings and legacy date helpers.
frontend/src/utils/demographicsExtract.t: Extracts patient demographics from pasted text using regex patterns and heuristics.
frontend/src/utils/draftAdminToken.ts: Retrieves and checks a persisted Draft admin token from URL or sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/localPersistence.ts: Loads, saves, and clears locally stored surgery cases with BigInt handling and field normalization.
frontend/src/utils/mergeCases.ts: Merges local and server surgery cases and prepares pending local changes for sync.
frontend/src/utils/prefill.ts: Finds the latest case by MRN and extracts demographic prefill data for new entries.
frontend/src/utils/tasksChecklist.ts: Defines task metadata and utilities to create, normalize, and filter surgery task checklists.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, new feature requests, and known issues for the Surgery Case Tracker. Highlights frontend rebuild and redeploy tasks plus backend-binding verification needs.
